title: Jobs vs. Careers
description: An exploration of how strategic career planning impacts long-term financial outcomes compared to simply having jobs, with a focus on building career capital and mapping personal career paths.
learning_objectives: Differentiate between a job and a career
Identify how career paths affect long-term financial outcomes
Evaluate personal interests and skills in relation to potential career paths
Develop preliminary career path strategies for financial success
Analyze the financial impact of different career decisions over time

skill_builder.title: Career Path Planner
skill_builder.description: An interactive activity where students develop strategic career path plans that align with their interests and financial goals.
